name: Buff Barry Beans 2
description:
The sequel to Buff Barry Beans is finally here!

An open-world survival game inspired by combining Terraria and Minecraft with a whole new perspective.

A note from the dev: This release of the game is far from finished, there were just so many issues that I had to strip down the release into a more playable version. As a result, this release is more of a tech demo than an actual game. Patches to the game that bring more features will be added soon though!
